mapper.select: SELECT member_no, member_name, member_address, member_phone, member_email FROM member ORDER BY member_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_no, member_name, member_address, member_phone, member_email, id, pwd) VALUES(member_seq.nextval, #{member_name}, #{member_address}, #{member_phone}, #{member_email}, #{id}, #{pwd})
